rows.label: qst202101_0010
rows.name:
Astounding! Stupendous!
What a momentous find!

rows.label: qst202101_0020
rows.name:
Gah!
...You gave me a jump.

rows.label: qst202101_0030
rows.name:
Please, listen!
This may well be the discovery of the century!

rows.label: qst202101_0040
rows.name: Look, just chill out for a second, Shiki.

rows.label: qst202101_0050
rows.name: What's all this about?

rows.label: qst202101_0060
rows.name:
Oh, ah... Please excuse me.
I got a little excited, I suppose...

rows.label: qst202101_0070
rows.name:
I've been reading through all the
Tomes of Mors we collected, and...

rows.label: qst202101_0080
rows.name: After deciphering all four volumes, it seems...!

rows.label: qst202101_0090
rows.name: It seems...?

rows.label: qst202101_0100
rows.name: It seems!

rows.label: qst202101_0110
rows.name:
They reveal the location of a
long-lost ancient stone tablet!

rows.label: qst202101_0120
rows.name:
That sounds...dull.
All that reading and that's what you got?

rows.label: qst202101_0130
rows.name:
Now now, isn't that enough?
It's knowledge from the past!

rows.label: qst202101_0140
rows.name:
So... What kind of thing is
this ancient tablet?

rows.label: qst202101_0150
rows.name:
Well, seeing as how the books are
known as "Tomes of Mors"...

rows.label: qst202101_0160
rows.name: I imagine it would contain wisdom from Mors.

rows.label: qst202101_0170
rows.name:
In other words, ancient knowledge on a slab!
The greatest treasure known to man!

rows.label: qst202101_0180
rows.name: Cool, huh? Are you all excited yet?

rows.label: qst202101_0190
rows.name: Why don't we go looking for it together?!

rows.label: qst202101_0200
rows.name:
...That does sound interesting.
I think we should do it, Rex.

rows.label: qst202101_0210
rows.name: I didn't think you'd be so keen, Homura.

rows.label: qst202101_0220
rows.name:
Well, I mean...
It's like a treasure hunt, no?

rows.label: qst202101_0230
rows.name:
Uh, yeah I guess.
Sure, let's get preparations in order and go!

rows.label: qst202101_0240
rows.name: Oh boy!

rows.label: qst202101_0250
rows.name:
Yeah! Woo!
I knew you'd agree! Thank you, friends!

rows.label: qst202101_0260
rows.name:
Right! Fortune favors the bold!
Let's go!

rows.label: qst202101_0270
rows.name: No, see, I said "preparations", didn't I...?
